description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0106 ( Query/response format code)
name: v2 Query/response format code

property.description: The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged

text.div:
Query/response format code

CodeDescriptionDeutsch (German)Nederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
D Response is in display formatAntwort im Anzeige-FormatAntwoord is in weergavestructuurdeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
R Response is in record-oriented formatAntwort im datensatzorientierten FormatAntwoord is in record-georiënteerde structuurdeprecatedfrom v2.1, removed after v2.6
T Response is in tabular formatAntwoord is in tabelstructuurdeprecatedadded v2.3, removed after v2.6
